import React from 'react' import '../css/post.css' import { Avatar, IconButton } from '@mui/material' import ThumbUpIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ThumbUp'; import InsertCommentIcon from '@mui/icons-material/InsertComment'; import IosShareIcon from '@mui/icons-material/IosShare'; import AddIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Add'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; // import { ThumbUpIcon, InsertCommentIcon, IosShareIcon } from '@mui/icons-material' export default function Post({ textContent, date, username }) { return (
{username}

{date}

Community Info

{textContent}

Like
Comment
Share
) }
